subject: Simsonn Racing Simulator Pressure Handbrake and the Arduino broke
description_text:
Good morning, I bought a Simsonn Racing Simulator Pressure Handbrake
and the Arduino broke, is there any way to order a new Arduino?

conversations.body_text: Hi d4rck,  After plugging in the USB, does the power indicator light turn on? Can the device be detected in Freejoy? Please send us a screenshot so we can help verify.Â
